alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:20PM CDT until May 07 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND CENTRAL HENRY COUNTIES... At 320 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Big Sandy, Haigler Ridge, Manleyville, Old Springville, Buchanan, India, Sunnyside, Whitlock, Porter Court, Pine Hill, Van Dyke and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
